Koç University, College of Engineering, Istanbul 2008-2013
Graduated, Chemical & Biological Engineering Half merit scholarship.
Hasan-Sabriye Gümüş Anadolu Lisesi, Istanbul 2004-2008
CAREER SUMMARY
Cargill Tarım ve Gıda, Istanbul
Category Sales Manager - Binders and Adhesives Business 2023-present
• Leading interaction with local paper, corrugated board, textile and gypsum board market customers to drive profitable sales, together with strong focus on new business development
• Distributor management, in terms of tracking profitability and market development
• Conducting end-to-end internal stakeholder management, to ressolve customer problems
• Project management, in terms of creating and tracking new business opportunities
• Managing deployment of profitable new product into the existing market
Türk Henkel Kimya Sanayi, Istanbul
Key Account Manager 2018-2023
• Management of global OEM Accounts (Toyota-Hyundai-Honda-Daimler-MAN) and local bus manufacturers (Isuzu-Temsa-Otokar)
• Work on strategic development of and sustainable profitable growth with these customers within
Europe and Global
• Start and lead customer projects for key accounts through CRM and manage overall project pipeline
• Analyzing all customer requirements, developing solutions to complex problems, and providing assistance with variety of services and products
• Co-working with global head of accounts, product development, technical customer service teams
Technical Sales Engineer 2017-2018
• Technically resposible for Aucoustic & Structural Adhesive portpholio, including PU-MS technology.
• Managing and developing new customer projects according to needs of the account
• Managing 3rd party suppliers and their efficiency
• Work on technical paper work – PPAP Documents
• Work on margin efficiency activities, developing alternative RM
Dow Chemical Company, Istanbul 2014-2017
Road & Outplant Specialist – Polyurethane Business
• Terminal planning and managing activities with EU Plants
Customer Service Representative – Packaging and Specialty Plastics Business
• Order and shipment management of packaging and hygiene customers
• Manage customer quality claims related to product/supply service
• Relationship management with production plant and 3rd party shipment service provider globally
• Managing quarterly forecast per customer and negotiation with production plant
Summary
• Flexible in working in a team with the ability to prioritize and successfully complete multiple tasks.
Successfully carries out various tasks to meet multiple deadlines.
• Excellent planning and organization skills for achieving good results.
• Innovative problem solver.
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
